examples: I have written to him.
The essay is well written.
The price is written on the label.
Fear is written on his face.
much was written pro and con
The article is very well written.
His name written in great.
the written part of the exam
the written form of the language
It's written all over his face.
The article was poorly written.
He has written a slew of books.
written in an unsteady character
The program is written in BASIC.
The note was written in blue ink.
The word mew would be more expressively written mieaou.
easily the best book she's written
an ancient text written on papyrus
a letter written in childish scrawl
a story written in the third person
a poem written in iambic pentameter
This example is written in italics.
The book was written in the sixties.
The book is lively and well written.
an essay written in a familiar style
The instructions are simply written.
The whole story is written in rhyme.
a book written in a very florid style
The letter was written in bad French.
He has written a memoir of his mother.
example_translate: Страх написан у него на лице.
много было написано за и против
Это у него на лбу написано
Слово "мяу" можно было бы более выразительно передать как "миаоу".
бесспорно лучшая из написанных ею книг
Книга была написана в шестидесятые годы.
Весь этот рассказ написан в рифму.
книга, написанная в очень витиеватом стиле
Письмо было написано на плохом французском.
Он написал воспоминания о своей матери.
